scripts.build:report: (cd ../report-react && npm run build && cd ../accessibility-checker-extension && shx cp ../report-react/build/genReport.tsx ./src/ts/devtools/)
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:report && npm run build:help && cross-env NODE_ENV=development SASS_PATH=node_modules:src:node_modules/carbon-components/scss/globals/scss/vendor webpack -d
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:report && npm run build:help && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SASS_PATH=node_modules:src:node_modules/carbon-components/scss/globals/scss/vendor webpack -p && shx mv dist/background*.js dist/background.js && mv dist/tabListeners*.js dist/tabListeners.js && mv dist/draw*.js dist/draw.js
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:report && npm run build:help && cross-env NODE_ENV=watch SASS_PATH=node_modules:src:node_modules/carbon-components/scss/globals/scss/vendor webpack -d
scripts.build:watch:local: npm run build:report && npm run build:help && cross-env NODE_ENV=watch_local SASS_PATH=node_modules:src:node_modules/carbon-components/scss/globals/scss/vendor webpack -d
scripts.clean:all: shx rm -rf ./dist && shx rm -rf ./coverage && shx rm -rf ./package && shx rm -rf ./node_modules
scripts.package:browser: npm run build:prod && shx mkdir -p package && cd dist && zip -Zd -r ../package/accessibility-checker-extension.zip .
